# 27 - сообщение продавцу что его флот хотят купить
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.127
	title = "ftm_rent.127.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.127.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_wormhole 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# да
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.127.yes
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] accept request."
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime_in_days
					value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime_in_days
					value = 30
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_requester = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer
				
				# передача флота и денег
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = { 
					set_fleet_flag = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
					set_event_locked = no
					set_owner = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller
					give_fleet = { 
						controller = event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer
						days = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime_in_days
					}
				}
				
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.111 }
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					country_event = { id = ftm_rent.112 }
				}
				remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_selected
				set_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_arended
			}
		}
	}
	# нет
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.127.no
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] reject request."
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_requester = {
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.128 }
			
				# возврат ресурсов 	
		
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					set_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_back_cost
						value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
					}
				}	
				while = {
					count = 99
					if = {
						limit = {
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_back_cost
									value >= 10000
								}
							}
						}
						add_resource = { energy = 10000 }
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_back_cost
								value = -10000
							}
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_back_cost
									value >= 1000
								}
							}
						}
						add_resource = { energy = 1000 }
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_back_cost
								value = -1000
							}		
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_back_cost
									value >= 100
								}
							}
						}
						add_resource = { energy = 100 }
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_back_cost
								value = -100
							}
						}					
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_back_cost
									value >= 10
								}
							}
						}
						add_resource = { energy = 10 }
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_back_cost
								value = -10
							}
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_back_cost
									value >= 1
								}
							}
						}
						add_resource = { energy = 1 }
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_back_cost
								value = -1
							}					
						}
					}
					else = {
						#nothing
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}





# 28 - сообщение что нам отказались продавать флот
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.128
	title = "ftm_rent.128.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.128.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_assembly_fight 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.128.ok
	}
}





# 30 - сообщение-предупреждение при снятии флота с продажи
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.130
	title = "ftm_rent.130.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.130.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	# снять с продажи 
	option = {
		trigger = { # ВАЖНО - УСЛОВИЕ ПРОВЕРКИ ЧТО ИГРОК И ЕСТЬ ПРОДАВЕЦ - ДЛЯ ЗАЩИТЫ ОТ БАГОЮЗЕРОВ
			is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller
		}
		name = ftm_rent.130.yes
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = { 
						exists = owner
						owner = { 
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rent_country
						}
					}
				}
				log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.GetName] снимает флот с аренды."
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = { 
					set_owner = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller
					set_event_locked = no
				}
				remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_selected
			}
		}
	}
		
	# оставить флот на продаже
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.130.no
	}
}






# 70 - ежемесячная проверка наличия флота на продаже
event = {
	id = ftm_rent.170
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_selected
		NOT = {
			has_global_flag = ftm_rent_not_can_use_ai_buy
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_selected
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller
					}
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = ftm_ai_buy_block_time
					}
					NOT = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = {
							OR = {
								is_rival = prev
								opinion = {
									who = prev
									value < -50
								}
								their_opinion = {
									who = prev
									value < -50
								}
							}
						}
					}
					is_ai = yes
					is_country_type = default
					used_naval_capacity_percent < 0.8
					has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 10 }
					has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 5 }
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_sanction_block
					}
					has_communications = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller
				}
				random_list = {
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 1 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 4 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 7 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 10 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 13 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 16 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 19 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 22 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 25 }
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = { id = ftm_rent.171 days = 28 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}


# 71 - проверка наличия энергокредитов
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.171
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_selected
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = ftm_ai_buy_block_time
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		log = "[Root.GetName]: Запуск скрипта проверки наличия энергокредитов"
		event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_buyer_rented_fleet_slot_1_energy_ai_current_count
				value = 0
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			which = ftm_buyer_rented_fleet_slot_1_energy_ai_current_count
			value = 0
		}
		save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_checker
		export_resource_stockpile_to_variable = { resource = energy variable = ftm_buyer_rented_fleet_slot_1_energy_ai_current_count }
		event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = {
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_buyer_rented_fleet_slot_1_energy_ai_current_count
				value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_checker.ftm_buyer_rented_fleet_slot_1_energy_ai_current_count
			}
		}
		log = "[Root.GetName]: ЗАВЕРШЕНА ПРОВЕРКА ЭНЕРГИИ ДЛЯ ВХОДА НА АРЕНДУ. КОЛИЧЕСТВО: [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.ftm_buyer_rented_fleet_slot_1_energy_ai_current_count]."
		
		# проверка наличия энергии для входа на аренду
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_buyer_rented_fleet_slot_1_energy_ai_current_count
						value >= ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
					}
				}
			}
			log = "[Root.GetName]: средств для входа на аренду достаточно."
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.172 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_buyer_rented_fleet_slot_1_energy_ai_current_count
						value < ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
					}
				}
			}
			log = "[Root.GetName]: не хватает средств для входа на аренду."
			set_timed_country_flag = { flag = ftm_ai_buy_block_time days = 40 }
		}
	}
}


# 72 - проверка необходимости покупки
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.172
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					AND = { # нормальные условия
						OR = {
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power < 2000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 25 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 10 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 1000
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 2000
									fleet_power < 5000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 40 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 20 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 1900
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 5000
									fleet_power < 10000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 50 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 30 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 3500
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 10000
									fleet_power < 25000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 75 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 40 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 6300
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 25000
									fleet_power < 50000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 100 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 50 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 11500
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 50000
									fleet_power < 100000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 150 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 75 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 21900
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 100000
									fleet_power < 250000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 200 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 100 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 45800
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 250000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 300 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 150 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 80000
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { # угроза - сильный сосед
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_at_war = no
								any_neighbor_country = {
									is_country_type = default
									OR = {
										is_homicidal = yes
										AND = {
											is_rival = prev
											relative_power = {
												who = prev
												category = fleet
												value >= equivalent
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								has_global_flag = gray_goo_crisis_active
								NOT = {
									has_global_flag = graygoo_defeated
								}
							}
							AND = {
								has_global_flag = marauder_crisis_started
								NOT = {
									has_global_flag = great_khan_dead
								}
							}
							has_global_flag = war_in_heaven_ongoing
						}
						OR = {
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power < 2000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 15 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 5 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 1500
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 2000
									fleet_power < 5000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 20 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 10 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 2850
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 5000
									fleet_power < 10000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 25 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 15 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 5250
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 10000
									fleet_power < 25000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 40 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 20 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 9450
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 25000
									fleet_power < 50000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 50 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 25 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 17250
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 50000
									fleet_power < 100000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 75 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 40 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 32850
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 100000
									fleet_power < 250000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 100 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 50 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 68700
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 250000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 150 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 75 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 120000
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { # кризис - война с сильным противником
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_at_war = yes
								any_war = {
									any_war_participant = {
										is_at_war_with = root
										relative_power = {
											who = root
											category = fleet
											value >= equivalent
										}
									}
								}
							}
							has_global_flag = crisis_stage_1
							has_global_flag = crisis_stage_2
							has_global_flag = crisis_stage_3
							has_global_flag = crisis_stage_4
						}
						OR = {
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power < 2000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 10 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 5 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 2000
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 2000
									fleet_power < 5000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 15 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 7 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 3800
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 5000
									fleet_power < 10000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 20 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 10 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 7000
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 10000
									fleet_power < 25000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 25 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 15 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 12600
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 25000
									fleet_power < 50000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 35 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 20 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 23000
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 50000
									fleet_power < 100000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 50 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 25 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 43800
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 100000
									fleet_power < 250000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 75 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 35 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 91600
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = {
									fleet_power >= 250000
								}
								has_monthly_income = { resource = energy value >= 100 }
								has_monthly_income = { resource = alloys value >= 50 }
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value <= 160000
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			} # конец проверки
			
			log = "[Root.GetName]: сделал покупку флота."
			save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer
			
			# передача флота и денег
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime_in_days
					value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime_in_days
					value = 30
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = { 
				set_fleet_flag = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
				set_event_locked = no
				set_owner = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller
				give_fleet = { 
					controller = event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer
					days = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime_in_days
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_1_buyer = { 
				set_timed_country_flag = { flag = ftm_ai_sell_block_time days = 1800 }
				set_timed_country_flag = { flag = ftm_ai_buy_block_time days = 450 }
			
				# снятие ресурсов при покупке			
		
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
					set_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_cost
						value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
					}
				}	
				while = {
					count = 99
					if = {
						limit = {
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_cost
									value >= 10000
								}
							}
						}
						add_resource = { energy = -10000 }
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_cost
								value = -10000
							}
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_cost
									value >= 1000
								}
							}
						}
						add_resource = { energy = -1000 }
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_cost
								value = -1000
							}		
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_cost
									value >= 100
								}
							}
						}
						add_resource = { energy = -100 }
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_cost
								value = -100
							}
						}					
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_cost
									value >= 10
								}
							}
						}
						add_resource = { energy = -10 }
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_cost
								value = -10
							}
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_cost
									value >= 1
								}
							}
						}
						add_resource = { energy = -1 }
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_lot_cost
								value = -1
							}					
						}
					}
					else = {
						#nothing
					}
				}	
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.112 }
			}
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_selected	
			set_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_arended	
		}
		else = {
			set_timed_country_flag = { flag = ftm_ai_buy_block_time days = 300 }
		}
	}
}




# 80 - ежегодная проверка условий продажи для ии
event = {
	id = ftm_rent.180
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_selected
				has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_arended
				has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_in_progress
			}
		}
		NOT = {
			has_global_flag = ftm_rent_not_can_use_ai_sale
		}
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = crisis_stage_1
				has_global_flag = crisis_stage_2
				has_global_flag = crisis_stage_3
				has_global_flag = crisis_stage_4
				AND = {
					has_global_flag = gray_goo_crisis_active
					NOT = {
						has_global_flag = graygoo_defeated
					}
				}
				AND = {
					has_global_flag = marauder_crisis_started
					NOT = {
						has_global_flag = great_khan_dead
					}
				}
				has_global_flag = war_in_heaven_ongoing
			}
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_selected
						has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_arended
						has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_in_progress
					}
				}
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = ftm_ai_sell_block_time
					}
					is_homicidal = no
					is_ai = yes
					is_country_type = default
					is_at_war = no
					used_naval_capacity_percent > 0.8
					resource_stockpile_compare = { resource = energy value < 50000 }
					NOT = {
						any_neighbor_country = {
							is_country_type = default
							OR = {
								is_homicidal = yes
								is_rival = prev
								opinion = {
									who = prev
									value < -50
								}
								their_opinion = {
									who = prev
									value < -50
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = ftm_rent_slot_1_num_fleet_count
					value = 0
				}
				every_owned_fleet = {
					limit = {
						fleet_power > 2000
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_habitat_station
							}
						}
					}
					owner = {
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_1_num_fleet_count
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_1_num_fleet_count
							value > 2
						}
					}
					random_list = {
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.181 days = 8 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.181 days = 38 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.181 days = 68 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.181 days = 98 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.181 days = 128 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.181 days = 158 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.181 days = 188 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.181 days = 218 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.181 days = 248 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.181 days = 278 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.181 days = 308 }
						}
						10 = {
							country_event = { id = ftm_rent.181 days = 338 }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}


# 81 - выставление флота на продажу (ИИ)
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.181
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_selected
				has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_arended
				has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_in_progress
				has_country_flag = ftm_ai_sell_block_time
			}
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					AND = {
						is_alliance_fleet = no
						solar_system = {
							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_habitat_station
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
								has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
								has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
								has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
								has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
								has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
								has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
								has_fleet_flag = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
								has_fleet_flag = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
								has_fleet_flag = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3
								has_fleet_flag = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_4
								has_fleet_flag = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_5
								has_fleet_flag = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_6
							}
						}
						OR = {
							AND = {
								fleet_power > 2000
								years_passed >= 20
								years_passed < 50
							}
							AND = {
								fleet_power > 5000
								years_passed >= 50
								years_passed < 100
							}
							AND = {
								fleet_power > 10000
								years_passed >= 100
								years_passed < 150
							}
							AND = {
								fleet_power > 20000
								years_passed >= 150
								years_passed < 200
							}
							AND = {
								fleet_power > 30000
								years_passed >= 200
							}
							AND = {
								fleet_power > 10000
								mid_game_years_passed > 0
							}
							AND = {
								fleet_power > 30000
								end_game_years_passed > 0
							}
						}
					}
				}

					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
							value = 210000
						}
						while = {
							count = 9
							random_list = {
								10 = {
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										check_variable = {
											which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
											value < 168000
										}
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value = 0.9
									}
								}
								10 = {
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										check_variable = {
											which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
											value < 168000
										}
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value = 0.92
									}
								}
								10 = {
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										check_variable = {
											which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
											value < 168000
										}
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value = 0.95
									}
								}
								10 = {
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										check_variable = {
											which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
											value < 168000
										}
									}
									multiply_variable = {

									}

								10 = {

										factor = 0

									}

										}

									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value = 1.1
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						fleet_power >= 750000
						fleet_power < 1000000
					}
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = {
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
							value = 220000
						}
						while = {
							count = 9
							random_list = {
								10 = {

										factor = 0

										}
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value = 0.9
									}
								}
								10 = {
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										check_variable = {
											which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost

										}
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
										value = 0.92
									}
								}
								10 = {
									modifier = {
										factor = 0
										check_variable = {
											which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost

										}
									}
									multiply_variable = {

									}

				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller = {
					log = "[Root.GetName]: ценность флота [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1.GetFleetName] равна [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost]"
					multiply_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
						value = @ftm_cost_mult_rent
					}
					log = "[Root.GetName]: ценность флота [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1.GetFleetName] с учетом коэфициента аренды равна [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost]"
					multiply_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
						value = @ftm_cost_mult_energy
					}
					log = "[Root.GetName]: цена флота [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1.GetFleetName] в энергокредитах равна [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost]"
					round_variable_to_closest = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
						value = 1
					}
					log = "[Root.GetName]: окончательная цена флота [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1.GetFleetName] равна [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost]"
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_1_selected
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.104 }
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1 = { 
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = leader
					}
					leader = {
						save_event_target_as = flagship_leader
						unassign_leader = this
					}
				}
				set_owner = event_target:ftm_rent_country
				set_event_locked = yes
				fleet_event = { id = ftm_rent.199 }
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rent_slot_1_time_in_months
				value = 60
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
				value = 24
			}
			random_list = {
				10 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
						value = 12
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
						value = 0.4
					}
					round_variable_to_closest = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
						value = 1
					}
					log = "[Root.GetName]: цена флота [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1.GetFleetName] с учетом времени аренды равна [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost]"
				}
				10 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
						value = 24
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
						value = 0.6
					}
					round_variable_to_closest = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
						value = 1
					}
					log = "[Root.GetName]: цена флота [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1.GetFleetName] с учетом времени аренды равна [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost]"
				}
				10 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
						value = 36
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
						value = 0.75
					}
					round_variable_to_closest = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
						value = 1
					}
					log = "[Root.GetName]: цена флота [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1.GetFleetName] с учетом времени аренды равна [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost]"
				}
				10 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
						value = 48
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
						value = 0.9
					}
					round_variable_to_closest = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
						value = 1
					}
					log = "[Root.GetName]: цена флота [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1.GetFleetName] с учетом времени аренды равна [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost]"
				}
				10 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_renttime
						value = 60
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
						value = 1
					}
					round_variable_to_closest = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_cost
						value = 1

				}

					multiply_variable = {

# 98 - сообщение-уведомление о конце аренды
fleet_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.198
	hide_window = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		every_country = {
			limit = { is_country_type = default }
			create_message = {
				type = TRADE_DEAL_END_TIMEOUT
				localization = FTM_RENT_SLOT_1_NOTIFICATION_END
				days = 30
				target = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
				variable = {
					type = name
					localization = FLEET
					scope = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
				}
			}
		}
	}		
}



# 99 - сообщение-уведомление
fleet_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.199
	hide_window = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		every_country = {
			limit = { 
				AND = {
					is_country_type = default 
					has_communications = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller
					is_homicidal = no
				}
			}
			create_message = {
				type = FTM_MESSAGE
				localization = FTM_RENT_SLOT_1_NOTIFICATION
				days = 30
				target = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
				variable = {
					type = name
					localization = COUNTRY
					scope = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1_seller
				}
				variable = {
					type = name
					localization = FLEET
					scope = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_1
				}
			}
		}
	}		
}

###      #### #      ###  #####             ###
###     #     #     #   #   #               ###
###      ###  #     #   #   #               ###
###         # #     #   #   #               ###
###     ####  #####  ###    #               ###
###                                         ###
###############################################


# 1 - окно выбора флота для аренды
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.201
	title = "ftm_rent.201.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.201.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							exists = leader
						}
						is_alliance_fleet = no
						solar_system = {
							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_habitat_station
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
								has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
								has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
								has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
								has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
								has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
								has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_fleet = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = leader
					}
					is_alliance_fleet = no
					solar_system = {
						exists = space_owner
						space_owner = {
							is_same_value = root
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
							is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
							is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
							is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
							is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase

							is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station

							has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
							has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
							has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers

						}

				solar_system = {
					space_owner = {

				}

							has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
							has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
							has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
							has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
							has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
							has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation

				}

					space_owner = {
						save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_04_buyer

			limit = {

					AND = {

							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root

							OR = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_01 
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_02 
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_03
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_04
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship

								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase

								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station

							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn

							has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
							has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
							has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
							has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_05
				solar_system = {
					space_owner = {
						save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_05_buyer
					}
				}
			}
		}
		save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller
		log = "[Root.GetName] запустил аренда флота"
		set_variable = {
			which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost_manual
			value = 100
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 1
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.201.fleet_01
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.201.fleet_01.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_01 
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 1 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_01.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_01 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.202 }
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 2
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.201.fleet_02
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.201.fleet_02.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_02
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 2 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_02.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_02 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.202 }
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 3
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.201.fleet_03
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.201.fleet_03.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_03
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 3 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_03.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_03 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.202 }
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 4
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.201.fleet_04
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.201.fleet_04.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_04

		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 4 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_04.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_04 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.202 }

	}
		
	# выбор флота 5
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.201.fleet_05
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.201.fleet_05.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_05

			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_05 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.202 }
		}
	}
		
	# передумал
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.201.nope
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал передумал продавать флот"
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_in_progress	
		}
	}
	
}





# 2 - ручная настройка стартовой цены аренды
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.202
	title = "ftm_rent.202.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.202.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	# -10000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.202.minus10000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.202.minus10000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost_manual
				value >= 10001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost_manual
				value = -10000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.202 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.GetName] снижает цену на 10000 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# -1000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.202.minus1000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.202.minus1000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost_manual
				value >= 1001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost_manual
				value = -1000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.202 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.GetName] снижает цену на 1000 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# -100
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.202.minus100
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.202.minus100.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost_manual
				value >= 101
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost_manual
				value = -100
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.202 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.GetName] снижает цену на 100 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# +100
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.202.plus100
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.202.plus100.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost_manual
				value = 100
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.202 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.GetName] увеличивает цену на 100 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# +1000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.202.plus1000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.202.plus1000.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost_manual
				value = 1000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.202 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.GetName] увеличивает цену на 1000 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# +10000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.202.plus10000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.202.plus10000.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost_manual
				value = 10000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.202 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.GetName] увеличивает цену на 10000 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# done
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.202.done
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.202.done.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			# счетчик текущей цены
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost
				value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost_manual
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime
				value = 60
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.206 }
			log = "[Root.GetName] выставляет флот [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2.GetFleetName] на аренда за стартовую цену: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost]. Нужно выбрать срок аренды"
		}
	}
	
	
	
}





# 3 - запрос подтверждения продажи
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.203
	title = "ftm_rent.203.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.203.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2
		
	# подтвердить
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.203.confirm
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.203.confirm.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] подтверждает продажу флота [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2.GetFleetName] через аренду"
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.204 }
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_in_progress
			set_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_selected
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2 = { 
				set_owner = event_target:ftm_rent_country
				set_event_locked = yes
				fleet_event = { id = ftm_rent.299 }
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rent_slot_2_time_in_months
				value = 60
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = root modifier = ftm_rent_sanction }
				}
				set_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_sanction_block
			}
		}
	}
		
	# отказаться
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.203.nope
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал передумал выставлять флот [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2.GetFleetName] на аренду"
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_in_progress	
		}
	}
	
}





# 4 - выставление на продажу
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.204
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
	
		# ОБНУЛЕНИЕ СЧЕТЧИКОВ
		event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
			# корветы (corvette)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_corvette_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
			# эсминцы (destroyer)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_destroyer_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
			# крейсера (cruiser)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cruiser_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
			# линкоры (battleship)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_battleship_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
			# титаны (titan)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_titan_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
		}
		
		# ПРИСВОЕНИЕ СЧЕТЧИКОВ		
		
		# корветы (corvette)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_corvette_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2 
				}
			}	
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_corvette_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
			
		# эсминцы (destroyer)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_destroyer_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2 
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_destroyer_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
			
		# крейсера (cruiser)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_cruiser_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2 
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cruiser_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
			
		# линкоры (battleship)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_battleship_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2 
				}
				
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_battleship_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
			
		# титаны (titan)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_titan_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2 
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = {
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_titan_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}





# 5 - сообщение при недостатке энергии для покупки
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.205
	title = "ftm_rent.205.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.205.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.205.ok
	}
}





# 6 - настройка срока аренды
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.206
	title = "ftm_rent.206.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.206.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	# -12
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.206.minus12
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.206.minus12.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime
				value >= 36
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime
				value = -12
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.206 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.GetName] снижает срок аренды на 12 месяцев. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# -6
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.206.minus6
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.206.minus6.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime
				value >= 30
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime
				value = -6
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.206 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.GetName] снижает срок аренды на 6 месяцев. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# -3
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.206.minus3
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.206.minus3.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime
				value >= 27
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime
				value = -3
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.206 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.GetName] снижает срок аренды на 3 месяца. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# +3
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.206.plus3
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.206.plus3.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime
				value <= 237
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime
				value = 3
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.206 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.GetName] повышает срок аренды на 3 месяца. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# +6
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.206.plus6
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.206.plus6.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime
				value <= 234
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime
				value = 6
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.206 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.GetName] повышает срок аренды на 6 месяцев. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# +12
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.206.plus12
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.206.plus12.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime
				value <= 228
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime
				value = 12
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.206 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.GetName] повышает срок аренды на 12 месяцев. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# done
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.206.done
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.206.done.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			# счетчик текущего срока аренды
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.203 }
			log = "[Root.GetName] выставляет флот [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2.GetFleetName] на аренду за цену: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost] на срок: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime] месяцев. Нужно подтверждение"
		}
	}
}





# 8 - обратный отсчет счетчика времени срока аренды
event = {
	id = ftm_rent.208
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_arended
	}
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime
						value >= 1
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime
					value = -1
				}
			}
			log = "Слот 2 занят. Осталось месяцев: [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime
						value < 1
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2 = { 
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = leader
					}
					leader = {
						unassign_leader = this
					}
				}
				remove_fleet_flag = ftm_rented_sleet_slot_2
				#set_owner = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller
				fleet_event = { id = ftm_rent.298 }
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.214 }
				set_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime_in_days
					value = 0
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_2_buyer = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.214 }
			}
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_arended
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_sanction_block
			}
		}
	}
}





# 9 - обратный отсчет счетчика времени слота
event = {
	id = ftm_rent.209
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_selected
	}
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_rent_slot_2_time_in_months
						value >= 1
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rent_slot_2_time_in_months
					value = -1
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_rent_slot_2_time_in_months
						value < 1
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2 = { 
				set_owner = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller
				set_event_locked = no
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.213 }
			}
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_selected
		}
	}
}





# 10 - сообщение с информацией о флоте
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.210
	title = "ftm_rent.210.title"
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
			}
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.210.desc"
	}
	# mods
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.210.desc_mod"
	}
	picture = GFX_evt_fleet_neutral 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.210.ok
	}
}





# 11 - сообщение с информацией о покупке
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.211
	title = "ftm_rent.211.title"
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
			}
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.211.desc"
	}
	# mods
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.211.desc_mod"
	}
	picture = GFX_evt_signing 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.211.ok
	}
}





# 12 - сообщение с информацией об успешной продаже флота (+ начисление денег продавцу)
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.212
	title = "ftm_rent.212.title"
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
			}
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.212.desc"
	}
	# mods
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.212.desc_mod"
	}
	picture = GFX_evt_signing 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.212.ok
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.212.ok.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {

			# присвоение денег продавцу
				
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 							
				set_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_final_cost
					value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost
				}
			}
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.GetName]: победила цена в [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_cost] энергии. Присвоение денег..."
			while = {
				count = 99
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_final_cost
								value >= 10000
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 10000 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_final_cost
							value = -10000
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_final_cost
								value >= 1000
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 1000 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_final_cost
							value = -1000
						}		
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_final_cost
								value >= 100
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 100 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_final_cost
							value = -100
						}
					}					
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_final_cost
								value >= 10
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 10 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_final_cost
							value = -10
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_final_cost
								value >= 1
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 1 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_final_cost
							value = -1
						}					
					}
				}
				else = {
					#nothing
				}
			}	
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.GetName]: Присвоение денег завершено"	
		
		}
	}
}





# 13 - сообщение что продать флот не удалось
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.213
	title = "ftm_rent.213.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.213.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_hangar_bay 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.213.ok
	}
}





# 14 - сообщение об окончании аренды
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.214
	title = "ftm_rent.214.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.214.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes

	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.214.ok
	}
}





# 15 - арендуемый флот уничтожен
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.215
	hide_window = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_arended
		is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rent_slot_2_buyer
	}

	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2
			}
			log = "Проверка... Флот [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2.GetFleetName] существует"			
		}
		else = {
			log = "Проверка... Флот слота 2 аренды уничтожен"
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_destroyed
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_destroyed
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller = { 
					country_event = { id = ftm_rent.216 }
					add_opinion_modifier = {
						who = event_target:ftm_rent_slot_2_buyer
						modifier = ftm_destroy_rent_fleet
					}
				}
				event_target:ftm_rent_slot_2_buyer = { 
					country_event = { id = ftm_rent.217 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}





# 16 - сообщение что наш флот на аренде уничтожен
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.216
	title = "ftm_rent.216.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.216.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_exploding_ship 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# понять и простить
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.216.ok
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_arended
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime_in_days
				value = 0
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_sanction_block
			}
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_2_buyer = { 
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_destroyed
			}
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.GetName] прощает империи [event_target:ftm_rent_slot_2_buyer.GetName] уничтожение флота"
		}
	}
	# Потребовать компенсации
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.216.money
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.218 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.GetName] требует с империи [event_target:ftm_rent_slot_2_buyer.GetName] компенсации за уничтожение флота"
		}
	}
	# Ввести санкции
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.216.block
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.216.block_info
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_2_buyer = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.221 }
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					who = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller
					modifier = ftm_rent_sanction
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_destroyed
			}
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_arended
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_renttime_in_days
				value = 0
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_2_sanction_block
			}
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_2_seller.GetName] запрещает империи [event_target:ftm_rent_slot_2_buyer.GetName] арендовать свои флоты"
		}
	}
}





# 17 - сообщение что мы уничтожили флот взятый в аренду
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.217
