# 1 - окно выбора флота для аренды
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.301
	title = "ftm_rent.301.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.301.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							exists = leader
						}
						is_alliance_fleet = no
						solar_system = {
							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_habitat_station
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
								has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
								has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
								has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
								has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
								has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
								has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_fleet = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = leader
					}
					is_alliance_fleet = no
					solar_system = {
						exists = space_owner
						space_owner = {
							is_same_value = root
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
							is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
							is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
							is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
							is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_habitat_station
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
							has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
							has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
							has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
							has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
							has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
							has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_01
				solar_system = {
					space_owner = {
						save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_01_buyer
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							exists = leader
						}
						is_alliance_fleet = no
						solar_system = {
							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_01
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_habitat_station
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
								has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
								has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
								has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
								has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
								has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
								has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_fleet = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = leader
					}
					is_alliance_fleet = no
					solar_system = {
						exists = space_owner
						space_owner = {
							is_same_value = root
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_01
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
							is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
							is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
							is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
							is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_habitat_station
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
							has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
							has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
							has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
							has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
							has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
							has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_02
				solar_system = {
					space_owner = {
						save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_02_buyer
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							exists = leader
						}
						is_alliance_fleet = no
						solar_system = {
							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_01 
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_02 
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_habitat_station
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
								has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
								has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
								has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
								has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
								has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
								has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_fleet = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = leader
					}
					is_alliance_fleet = no
					solar_system = {
						exists = space_owner
						space_owner = {
							is_same_value = root
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_01 
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_02
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
							is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
							is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
							is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
							is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_habitat_station
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
							has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
							has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
							has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
							has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
							has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
							has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_03
				solar_system = {
					space_owner = {
						save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_03_buyer
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							exists = leader
						}
						is_alliance_fleet = no
						solar_system = {
							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_01 
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_02 
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_03
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_habitat_station
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
								has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
								has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
								has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
								has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
								has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
								has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_fleet = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = leader
					}
					is_alliance_fleet = no
					solar_system = {
						exists = space_owner
						space_owner = {
							is_same_value = root
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_01 
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_02 
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_03
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
							is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
							is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
							is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
							is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_habitat_station
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
							has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
							has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
							has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
							has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
							has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
							has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_04
				solar_system = {
					space_owner = {
						save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_04_buyer
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_fleet = {
					AND = {
						NOT = {
							exists = leader
						}
						is_alliance_fleet = no
						solar_system = {
							exists = space_owner
							space_owner = {
								is_same_value = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_01 
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_02 
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_03
								is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_04
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
								is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
								is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
								is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
								is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
								is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
								is_ship_class = shipclass_habitat_station
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
								has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
								has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
								has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
								has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
								has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
								has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
								has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_fleet = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						exists = leader
					}
					is_alliance_fleet = no
					solar_system = {
						exists = space_owner
						space_owner = {
							is_same_value = root
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_01 
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_02 
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_03
							is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_04
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							is_ship_class = shipclass_constructor
							is_ship_class = shipclass_colonizer
							is_ship_class = shipclass_science_ship
							is_ship_class = shipclass_transport
							is_ship_class = shipclass_starbase
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_special
							is_ship_class = shipclass_military_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_mining_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_research_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_observation_station
							is_ship_class = shipclass_habitat_station
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							has_fleet_flag = armada_of_the_voidborn
							has_fleet_flag = star_rider_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = first_storm_wing
							has_fleet_flag = dwamak_bashers
							has_fleet_flag = unhinged_screamer_flotilla
							has_fleet_flag = frenzied_volunteer_squadron
							has_fleet_flag = her_chosen_champions
							has_fleet_flag = order_of_eternal_night
							has_fleet_flag = twilight_congregation
						}
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_05
				solar_system = {
					space_owner = {
						save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_05_buyer
					}
				}
			}
		}
		save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller
		log = "[Root.GetName] запустил аренда флота"
		set_variable = {
			which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost_manual
			value = 100
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 1
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.301.fleet_01
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.301.fleet_01.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_01 
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 1 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_01.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_01 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.302 }
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 2
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.301.fleet_02
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.301.fleet_02.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_02
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 2 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_02.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_02 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.302 }
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 3
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.301.fleet_03
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.301.fleet_03.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_03
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 3 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_03.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_03 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.302 }
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 4
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.301.fleet_04
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.301.fleet_04.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_04
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 4 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_04.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_04 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.302 }
		}
	}
		
	# выбор флота 5
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.301.fleet_05
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.301.fleet_05.tooltip
		trigger = {
			exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_05 
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал для аренды флот 5 ([event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_05.GetFleetName])"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_05 = { 
				save_global_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.302 }
		}
	}
		
	# передумал
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.301.nope
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал передумал продавать флот"
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_in_progress	
		}
	}
	
}





# 2 - ручная настройка стартовой цены аренды
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.302
	title = "ftm_rent.302.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.302.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	# -10000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.302.minus10000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.302.minus10000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost_manual
				value >= 10001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost_manual
				value = -10000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.302 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] снижает цену на 10000 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# -1000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.302.minus1000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.302.minus1000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost_manual
				value >= 1001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost_manual
				value = -1000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.302 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] снижает цену на 1000 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# -100
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.302.minus100
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.302.minus100.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost_manual
				value >= 101
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost_manual
				value = -100
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.302 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] снижает цену на 100 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# +100
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.302.plus100
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.302.plus100.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost_manual
				value = 100
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.302 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] увеличивает цену на 100 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# +1000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.302.plus1000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.302.plus1000.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost_manual
				value = 1000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.302 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] увеличивает цену на 1000 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# +10000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.302.plus10000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.302.plus10000.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost_manual
				value = 10000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.302 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] увеличивает цену на 10000 единиц. Текущая цена: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost_manual]"
		}
	}
	
	# done
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.302.done
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.302.done.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			# счетчик текущей цены
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost
				value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost_manual
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime
				value = 60
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.306 }
			log = "[Root.GetName] выставляет флот [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3.GetFleetName] на аренда за стартовую цену: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost]. Нужно выбрать срок аренды"
		}
	}
	
	
	
}





# 3 - запрос подтверждения продажи
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.303
	title = "ftm_rent.303.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.303.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3
		
	# подтвердить
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.303.confirm
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.303.confirm.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] подтверждает продажу флота [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3.GetFleetName] через аренду"
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.304 }
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_in_progress
			set_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_selected
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3 = { 
				set_owner = event_target:ftm_rent_country
				set_event_locked = yes
				fleet_event = { id = ftm_rent.399 }
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rent_slot_3_time_in_months
				value = 60
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_opinion_modifier = { who = root modifier = ftm_rent_sanction }
				}
				set_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_sanction_block
			}
		}
	}
		
	# отказаться
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.303.nope
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] выбрал передумал выставлять флот [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3.GetFleetName] на аренду"
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_in_progress	
		}
	}
	
}





# 4 - выставление на продажу
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.304
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
	
		# ОБНУЛЕНИЕ СЧЕТЧИКОВ
		event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
			# корветы (corvette)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_corvette_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
			# эсминцы (destroyer)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_destroyer_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
			# крейсера (cruiser)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cruiser_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
			# линкоры (battleship)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_battleship_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
			# титаны (titan)
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_titan_count # всего
				value = 0
			}
		}
		
		# ПРИСВОЕНИЕ СЧЕТЧИКОВ		
		
		# корветы (corvette)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_corvette_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3 
				}
			}	
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_corvette_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
			
		# эсминцы (destroyer)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_destroyer_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3 
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_destroyer_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
			
		# крейсера (cruiser)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_cruiser_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3 
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cruiser_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
			
		# линкоры (battleship)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_battleship_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3 
				}
				
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_battleship_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
			
		# титаны (titan)
		every_owned_ship = {
			limit = {
				ftm_titan_ship_size_types = yes
				fleet = {
					is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3 
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = {
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_titan_count # всего
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}





# 5 - сообщение при недостатке энергии для покупки
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.305
	title = "ftm_rent.305.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.305.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.305.ok
	}
}





# 6 - настройка срока аренды
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.306
	title = "ftm_rent.306.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.306.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	# -12
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.306.minus12
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.306.minus12.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime
				value >= 36
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime
				value = -12
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.306 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] снижает срок аренды на 12 месяцев. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# -6
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.306.minus6
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.306.minus6.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime
				value >= 30
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime
				value = -6
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.306 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] снижает срок аренды на 6 месяцев. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# -3
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.306.minus3
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.306.minus3.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime
				value >= 27
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime
				value = -3
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.306 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] снижает срок аренды на 3 месяца. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# +3
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.306.plus3
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.306.plus3.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime
				value <= 237
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime
				value = 3
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.306 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] повышает срок аренды на 3 месяца. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# +6
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.306.plus6
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.306.plus6.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime
				value <= 234
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime
				value = 6
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.306 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] повышает срок аренды на 6 месяцев. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# +12
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.306.plus12
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.306.plus12.tooltip
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime
				value <= 228
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime
				value = 12
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.306 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] повышает срок аренды на 12 месяцев. Текущий срок аренды: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime]"
		}
	}
	
	# done
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.306.done
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.306.done.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			# счетчик текущего срока аренды
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.303 }
			log = "[Root.GetName] выставляет флот [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3.GetFleetName] на аренду за цену: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost] на срок: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime] месяцев. Нужно подтверждение"
		}
	}
}





# 8 - обратный отсчет счетчика времени срока аренды
event = {
	id = ftm_rent.308
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_arended
	}
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime
						value >= 1
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime
					value = -1
				}
			}
			log = "Слот 3 занят. Осталось месяцев: [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime]"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime
						value < 1
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3 = { 
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = leader
					}
					leader = {
						unassign_leader = this
					}
				}
				remove_fleet_flag = ftm_rented_sleet_slot_3
				#set_owner = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller
				fleet_event = { id = ftm_rent.398 }
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.314 }
				set_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime_in_days
					value = 0
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_3_buyer = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.314 }
			}
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_arended
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_sanction_block
			}
		}
	}
}





# 9 - обратный отсчет счетчика времени слота
event = {
	id = ftm_rent.309
	hide_window = yes	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_selected
	}
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_rent_slot_3_time_in_months
						value >= 1
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
				change_variable = {
					which = ftm_rent_slot_3_time_in_months
					value = -1
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
					check_variable = {
						which = ftm_rent_slot_3_time_in_months
						value < 1
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3 = { 
				set_owner = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller
				set_event_locked = no
			}
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.313 }
			}
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_selected
		}
	}
}





# 10 - сообщение с информацией о флоте
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.310
	title = "ftm_rent.310.title"
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
			}
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.310.desc"
	}
	# mods
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.310.desc_mod"
	}
	picture = GFX_evt_fleet_neutral 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.310.ok
	}
}

			}
		}

	}

		trigger = {
			ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
		}

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = ftm_rent.311.ok
	}

# 12 - сообщение с информацией об успешной продаже флота (+ начисление денег продавцу)
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.312
	title = "ftm_rent.312.title"
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
			}
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.312.desc"
	}
	# mods
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			ftm_comparible_mods_flags = yes
		}
		text = "ftm_rent.312.desc_mod"
	}
	picture = GFX_evt_signing 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.312.ok
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.312.ok.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {

			# присвоение денег продавцу
				
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 							
				set_variable = {
					which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_final_cost
					value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost
				}
			}
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName]: победила цена в [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost] энергии. Присвоение денег..."
			while = {
				count = 99
				if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_final_cost
								value >= 10000
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 10000 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_final_cost
							value = -10000
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_final_cost
								value >= 1000
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 1000 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_final_cost
							value = -1000
						}		
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_final_cost
								value >= 100
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 100 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_final_cost
							value = -100
						}
					}					
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_final_cost
								value >= 10
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 10 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_final_cost
							value = -10
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
							check_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_final_cost
								value >= 1
							}
						}
					}
					add_resource = { energy = 1 }
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
						change_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_final_cost
							value = -1
						}					
					}
				}
				else = {
					#nothing
				}
			}	
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName]: Присвоение денег завершено"	
		
		}
	}
}





# 13 - сообщение что продать флот не удалось
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.313
	title = "ftm_rent.313.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.313.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_hangar_bay 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.313.ok
	}
}





# 14 - сообщение об окончании аренды
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.314
	title = "ftm_rent.314.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.314.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_federation_fleet 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	location = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.314.ok
	}
}





# 15 - арендуемый флот уничтожен
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.315
	hide_window = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_arended
		is_same_value = event_target:ftm_rent_slot_3_buyer
	}

	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3
			}
			log = "Проверка... Флот [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3.GetFleetName] существует"			
		}
		else = {
			log = "Проверка... Флот слота 3 аренды уничтожен"
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_destroyed
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_destroyed
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
					country_event = { id = ftm_rent.316 }
					add_opinion_modifier = {
						who = event_target:ftm_rent_slot_3_buyer
						modifier = ftm_destroy_rent_fleet
					}
				}
				event_target:ftm_rent_slot_3_buyer = { 
					country_event = { id = ftm_rent.317 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}





# 16 - сообщение что наш флот на аренде уничтожен
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.316
	title = "ftm_rent.316.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.316.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_exploding_ship 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# понять и простить
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.316.ok
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_arended
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime_in_days
				value = 0
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_sanction_block
			}
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_3_buyer = { 
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_destroyed
			}
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] прощает империи [event_target:ftm_rent_slot_3_buyer.GetName] уничтожение флота"
		}
	}
	# Потребовать компенсации
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.316.money
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.318 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] требует с империи [event_target:ftm_rent_slot_3_buyer.GetName] компенсации за уничтожение флота"
		}
	}
	# Ввести санкции
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.316.block
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.316.block_info
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_3_buyer = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.321 }
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					who = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller
					modifier = ftm_rent_sanction
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_destroyed
			}
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_arended
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime_in_days
				value = 0
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_sanction_block
			}
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] запрещает империи [event_target:ftm_rent_slot_3_buyer.GetName] арендовать свои флоты"
		}
	}
}





# 17 - сообщение что мы уничтожили флот взятый в аренду
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.317
	title = "ftm_rent.317.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.317.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_exploding_ship 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.317.ok
	}
}





# 18 - определение размера компенсации
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.318
	title = "ftm_rent.318.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.318.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_wormhole 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = {
			which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation
			value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_cost
		}
	}	
	
	# -10000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.318.minus10000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.318.minus10000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation
				value >= 10001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation
				value = -10000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.318 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] снижает компенсацию на 10000 единиц. Текущая компенсация: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation]"
		}
	}
	
	# -1000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.318.minus1000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.318.minus1000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation
				value >= 1001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation
				value = -1000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.318 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] снижает компенсацию на 1000 единиц. Текущая компенсация: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation]"
		}
	}
	
	# -100
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.318.minus100
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.318.minus100.tooltip
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
			check_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation
				value >= 101
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation
				value = -100
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.318 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] снижает компенсацию на 100 единиц. Текущая компенсация: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation]"
		}
	}
	
	# +100
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.318.plus100
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.318.plus100.tooltip
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation
				value = 100
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.318 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] увеличивает компенсацию на 100 единиц. Текущая компенсация: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation]"
		}
	}
	
	# +1000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.318.plus1000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.318.plus1000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation
				value = 1000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.318 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] увеличивает компенсацию на 1000 единиц. Текущая компенсация: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation]"
		}
	}
	
	# +10000
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.318.plus10000
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.318.plus10000.tooltip
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation
				value = 10000
			}
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.318 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] увеличивает компенсацию на 10000 единиц. Текущая компенсация: [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation]"
		}
	}
	
	# done
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.318.done
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.318.done.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.319 }
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] устаннавливает компенсацию в размере [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation] энергии"
		}
	}
}





# 19 - подтверждение размера компенсации
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.319
	title = "ftm_rent.319.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.319.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_wormhole 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# подтвердить
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.319.confirm
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.319.confirm.tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] подтверждает требование компенсации в размере [Root.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation]"
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_3_buyer = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.320 }
			}
		}
	}
		
	# изменить
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.319.nope
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[Root.GetName] решил изменить размер компенсации"
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.318 }
		}
	}
}





# 20 - сообщение что с нас потребовали компенсацию
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.320
	title = "ftm_rent.320.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.320.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_wormhole 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# согласиться
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.320.pay
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rent_slot_3_buyer.GetName] решает заплатить"
			log = "[Root.GetName]: Запуск скрипта проверки наличия энергокредитов"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
				set_variable = {
					which = ftm_rent_slot_3_compensation_energy_current_count
					value = 0
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rent_slot_3_compensation_check_energy
				value = 0
			}
			save_event_target_as = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_checker
			export_resource_stockpile_to_variable = { resource = energy variable = ftm_rent_slot_3_compensation_check_energy }
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = {
				set_variable = {
					which = ftm_rent_slot_3_compensation_energy_current_count
					value = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_checker.ftm_rent_slot_3_compensation_check_energy
				}
			}
			log = "[Root.GetName]: ЗАВЕРШЕНА ПРОВЕРКА ЭНЕРГИИ ДЛЯ КОМПЕНСАЦИИ. КОЛИЧЕСТВО: [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.ftm_rent_slot_3_compensation_energy_current_count]."
			
			
			### 
			
			#4
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_3_compensation_energy_current_count
							value < ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation
						}
					}
				}
				log = "Check [Root.GetName] energy: need [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation]... FAIL. NO ENERGY."
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.322 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = ftm_rent_slot_3_compensation_energy_current_count
							value >= ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation
						}
					}
				}
				log = "Check [Root.GetName] energy: need [event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation]... SUCCESS. ENERGY IN."
				
				
				# передача компенсации
				
				event_target:ftm_rent_slot_3_buyer = { 
				
					# снятие ресурсов			
			
					event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
						set_variable = {
							which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value
							value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation
						}
					}
					while = {
						count = 99
						if = {
							limit = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value
										value >= 10000
									}
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = -10000 }
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
								change_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value
									value = -10000
								}
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value
										value >= 1000
									}
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = -1000 }
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
								change_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value
									value = -1000
								}		
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value
										value >= 100
									}
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = -100 }
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
								change_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value
									value = -100
								}
							}					
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value
										value >= 10
									}
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = -10 }
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
								change_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value
									value = -10
								}
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
									check_variable = {
										which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value
										value >= 1
									}
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = -1 }
							event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
								change_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value
									value = -1
								}					
							}
						}
						else = {
							#nothing
						}
					}	
				}
				event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
					country_event = { id = ftm_rent.323 }

					# присвоение денег 

					set_variable = {
						which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value_get
						value = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation
					}
					while = {
						count = 99
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value_get
									value >= 10000
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = 10000 }
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value_get
								value = -10000
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value_get
									value >= 1000
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = 1000 }
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value_get
								value = -1000
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value_get
									value >= 100
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = 100 }
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value_get
								value = -100
							}				
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = { 
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value_get
									value >= 10
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = 10 }
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value_get
								value = -10
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value_get
									value >= 1
								}
							}
							add_resource = { energy = 1 }
							change_variable = {
								which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_compensation_value_get
								value = -1
							}	
						}
						else = {
							#nothing
						}
					}	
					log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName]: Присвоение компенсации завершено"	
				
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	# отказаться
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.320.not_pay
		hidden_effect = {
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rent_slot_3_buyer.GetName] отказывается платить"
			event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.324 }
			}
		}
	}
}





# 21 - сообщение что нам запретили арендовать флоты этой империи
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.321
	title = "ftm_rent.321.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.321.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_alien_segregation 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# ок
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.321.ok
	}
}





# 22 - сообщение что не хватает энергии на компенсацию
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.322
	title = "ftm_rent.322.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.322.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_wormhole 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# назад
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.322.ok
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = ftm_rent.320 }
		}
	}
}





# 23 - сообщение что нам выплатили компенсацию
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.323
	title = "ftm_rent.323.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.323.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_signing 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# назад
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.323.ok
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_arended
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime_in_days
				value = 0
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_sanction_block
			}
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_3_buyer = { 
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_destroyed
			}
		}
	}
}





# 24 - сообщение что нам отказались платить компенсацию
country_event = {
	id = ftm_rent.324
	title = "ftm_rent.324.title"
	desc = "ftm_rent.324.desc"
	picture = GFX_evt_assembly_fight 
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	# мы это запомним
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.324.ok
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_arended
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime_in_days
				value = 0
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_sanction_block
			}
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_3_buyer = { 
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_destroyed
			}
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] прощает империи [event_target:ftm_rent_slot_3_buyer.GetName] уничтожение флота и отказ платить"
		}
	}
	# Ввести санкции
	option = {
		name = ftm_rent.324.block
		custom_tooltip = ftm_rent.324.block_info
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:ftm_rent_slot_3_buyer = { 
				country_event = { id = ftm_rent.321 }
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					who = event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller
					modifier = ftm_rent_sanction
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_destroyed
			}
			remove_global_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_arended
			set_variable = {
				which = ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_renttime_in_days
				value = 0
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_sanction_block
				}
				remove_country_flag = ftm_rent_slot_3_sanction_block
			}
			log = "[event_target:ftm_rented_fleet_slot_3_seller.GetName] запрещает империи [event_target:ftm_rent_slot_3_buyer.GetName] арендовать свои флоты"
		}
	}
}
